reviews.text: Great outcome!! These guys did great work, very reasonably priced and could not be happier. Great at communicating and did exactly as we discussed. Will be our go to for service in years ahead!!

Ryan was very responsive and knowledgeable. I reached out to him about serious calcium build up on our spa with glass tiles and what could be done. They did a great job bringing it back to like new condition, following 7 yrs of build up.

Rhyne and team did a fantastic job. Explained everything before hand, stuck to the schedule, did a great job on the tile (I had forgotten what the tile looked like!), and even recommended products to keep it looking great going forward. Recommend them highly!

I own a pool building and repair company in Montgomery County. I’ve used Mako restorations numerous times on our projects and they’ve always done an amazing job. Here’s a before and after of one of the worst calcium deposits I’ve ever seen. They took care of it no problem!

Amazing company to work with. Rhyne explained to us the whole process of restoring the tiles to their beautiful shiny look, and that's exactly what he did his guy did. Great work ethic, he also gave us tips to prevent the calcium build up. Highly recommend Mako Pool Restauration!

Amazing company to work with. Honest, Reliable and trustworthy at Mako Pool Restorations. Another thing to add is great pricing for their services! I highly recommend using these guys for all things stone cleaning/Tile clean and sealing.
Mako Restoration made my pool look like new again! That calcium is gone. They removed the calcium and then recommended some chemicals to use. It’s beautiful! Reasonably priced also.
Mako Pool Restorations did a fabulous job.  They were on time, communicated with me every step of the way and check out the pics of the finished job.  Price was right too!  Highly recommend!!

Ryan was great he explained the process of removing the calcium buildup and staining on our pool tiles he also educated me on how to best maintain moving forward. He was honest about what was and wasn’t needed to fix the problem and keep the cost down. The work was quick and thorough. Thanks Ryan and Moses! Would highly recommend!

We received several quotes to get our glass tile cleaned. Mako was the only one that explained the process in full detail and showed why and how its important to use the right equipment since glass tile seems to be very difficult to clean. They showed up with professional equipment and did a great job! The tile looks like the day it was installed

I cannot recommend Mako enough! I hired them to remove calcium from my tile on my pool. They surpassed my expectations. Made my tile look like the day it was installed. I wish I would have found them sooner!

Communication was excellent throughout the quoting and service. Very pleased with the results. Pool was a bit cloudy after the calcium removal but after running the pump for a day, it is already starting to clear up. Before and after photos attached to this review
Fantastic job- I can’t believe the difference in the pool tile and rocks. Absolutely incredible. I100% recommend using this company and will call them again if the need arises.
Mako did an amazing job on the calcium removal for my pool! It looks brand new again. Rhyne was great to work with, super responsive, professional and detailed. Thank you Mako!

Just had our pool tile cleaned and sealed . We had some really bad calcium build up on our tiles and Ryan and Moses did an AMAZING job making everything look like new again. Ryan was so great to work with. He was very responsive and answered all of our questions. I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND MAKO POOL RESTORATIONS AND RYAN !! Best experience ever..!

Outstanding service! We had tried every product on the market to clean our pool tile with no results. Mako pool restoration came out and in two hours our tile looks brand new. Rhyne was so informative and helpful about future care on our tile. I am very happy we chose Mako and would highly recommend them!

Our 6 year old pool needed a good water line tile cleaning. We had a buildup of calcium, iron and rust on our travertine tile which looked really ugly. Rhyne came out in person to take a look to see what was going on and if we would  benefit from their services. And boy did we ever! Huge thanks to Mako Pool Restorations for making our pool look almost brand new again, and right in time for July 4th. Could not be happier with the job they did.

Did an amazing job cleaning out tile! Pool looks brand new again. They showed up on time and used the right equipment to get it done. Got multiple quotes and they were the only ones that seemed to really understand what was going on

Mako Pool Restorations company did an excellent job on cleaning the calcium off our glass tiles and travetine. My pool looks brand new again! The owner is amazing to work with and truly cares about the job he is doing.
Highly recommend! Have used Mako several times and the tile has always looked brand new afterwards. Very professional and cleans up after himself.
This company really stands out from other companies that remove calcium. Ryan always communicates , shows up on time, and does his absolute best to make sure satisfaction is guaranteed.
After they cleaned the pool ( removed calcium clumps and tile stain) it looked brand new.  Arrived on schedule. Worked quickly and cleaned up when finished. We have nothing but positives to report.
Crew showed up punctual and professional. My pool looks like I just installed the tile today! I will definitely recommend them and use them in the future when needed. Thx Mako!

Referred to Mako through my pool service to remove calcium buildup around water line and water features. Rhyne met me on time at my house. He exuded confidence and and was thorough in his explanation of the process and what result to expect. We are extremely pleased with the end result. Pool tile really looks better than when installed two years ago. Thanks Mako!

My pool tiles had so much calcium buildup they were basically wearing white belts. Then Rhyne showed up, put the deposits in a rear-naked choke, and made made it tap out in record time.

Now my pool looks brand new, and I swear the water even sparkles a little more. On top of that, Rhyne’s just a solid dude — shows up on time, explains what he’s doing, and leaves the place cleaner than he found it. If your pool’s got that crusty, hard-water look, let Rhyne handle it.
These guys are our "go to" company for anything pool restoration related. We have called upon them on at least a dozen times to service our clientele. I recommend, 5 stars
Rhyne and Craig are legitimate experts at what they do! Your Texas Pools will continue to work with Mako for many years to come! Thank you for all your hard work!
Ryne and Moses did an amazing job today! The before and after is great!  I highly recommend!!
Easy to work with and came as promised and performed our tile cleaning as promised. Tiles look new again and everything was cleaned up when completed.
Great price and great service. Knows what they're talking about when it comes to pools and tile cleaning. Highly recommend.

Fantastic experience! Mako restored our pool deck and refurbished our pool beautifully. Craig and Rhyne’s communication was excellent, they know their craft inside and out, and they were upfront about everything from the start. Professional, skilled, and a pleasure to work with. Highly recommend!

Rhyne got our pool looking great again getting rid of a bad scale problem we had for some time. Even talked to me about the condition of our plaster, and could hook us up with someone to acid wash it for a reasonable amount, and save us replastering costs. Looks great Rhyne!
Rhyne was great to work with and the results were outstanding. Great job Great people.

I have a saltwater pool and the tile contained a heavy residue of calcium build-up. Mako Pool Restoration used the glass bead method to remove the calcium. I also had the algae power washed off the rocks around the pool and the rocks sealed. The tile and the rocks looked great again.  Ryan was easy to deal with, quick quote, no extra hidden charges and cleaned up well. I would recommend this company.

They did a fantastic job. Moses was amazing with great attention to detail. They were even able to clean the rocks around the pool that another company couldn't. I will definitely be using them again when it needs to be reclined. Quick, professional and reasonably priced. Highly recommend them.
Rhyne is a great guy, easy to work with and does great work!
Fast, friendly and didba great job cleaning up my tile
My experience was great! They showed up when they said they would and removed the calcium build up on my pool tile. Will 100% be referring them customers.

Mako Pool Restorations made my tile look brand new!

Fair pricing and easy to work with!

We live in the era and time where trust in someone is at its rarity.

I trusted Rhyne (Mako Restoration) with an important high caliber client of mine.

To me putting my name on a reference is most valuable.

Rhyne did not disappoint. In fact Rhyne exceeded all expectations

If you find yourself thinking of money over experience, service and results then look elsewhere.

Now if you value trust in pricing, trust in workmanship and value the importance of respect in personal and in business with t

They responded to my request for information immediately.
They quoted a price which I accepted. After they finished the work, they said it wasn’t as difficult as they thought and reduced the price by 50%.
Looks like it did when the pool was built.

Great company!
Great service and results!!!! Highly recommended.
Very professional and did a great job.
Great job, service, and price. Thanks Ryan!
Night and day difference with our Pool Tile .. it was looking pretty rough and now it looks brand new again! Highly recommend
Responsive, professional, and quality work. Very pleased with the outcome of our pool tile and travertine deck cleaning.
They delivered what they promised in eliminating calcium stains on our pool tile.  And it was painless.  Thanks!

Did a great job on getting calcium off our flagstone / natural stone pool. Very responsive and reasonable.

Thanks
Great work getting our pool looking like new! Very professional, great communication- highly recommend!
On time and reasonable prices!  They worked magic on our pool.  Great job guys!
